## Disclaimer

The package sGSVD strongly mimicks the structure of Derek Beaton's GSVD, see Beaton et al., (2014)..

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# devtools install via github
devtools::install_github("vguillemot/sGSVD")
```
